    • Method Detail

      • tryConnectGET

        public HttpURLConnection tryConnectGET(String url)
                                throws IOException
        Try to connect to URL using GET method
        Parameters:
        url - URL to connect to
        Returns:
        Connection object or null if connection was unsuccessful but can be retried
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection was unsuccessful and shouldn't be retried

      • tryConnectPOST

        public HttpURLConnection tryConnectPOST(String url,
                               String postData)
                                 throws IOException
        Try to connect to URL and send POST data
        Parameters:
        url - URL to connect to
        postData - data to send as POST
        Returns:
        Connection object or null if connection was unsuccessful but can be retried
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection was unsuccessful and shouldn't be retried
